data.title: History of the Reformation in Germany by VON RANKE, Leopold: Near Fine Hardcover (1905)
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Hardcover - George Routledge and Sons, London - 1905 - Condition: Near Fine - First edition in English. Translated by Sarah Austin. Edited by Robert A. Johnson. Tall octavo. 792pp. Light brown cloth with red leather spine label gilt. Some rubbing on the label, a little light foxing on the titlepage, else near fine. - History of the Reformation in Germany
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

All books are first editions unless otherwise noted. New Jersey residents will be asked for sales tax. All items guaranteed, all items subject to prior sale. Members ABAA, ILAB.

112 Nicholson Road, Gloucester City, New Jersey 08030

books@betweenthecovers.com

Telephone 856-456-8008

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Our $10 rate is for UPS or Priority Mail. Our $5.50 rate is media mail which can take a week or two, or a month or two (rarely, but has happened). We email tracking information for all domestic shipments. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
